description:
Do you want to speak with more clarity and leave a greater impact with your audience? 

Have you every wondered how great public speakers are able to connect with their audience with seemingly effortless mastery? 

Great public speakers are made, not born...and one tool that all great speakers possess is the ability to tell a story. 

Storytelling is one of the most effective ways to engage a audience!

Regardless of what kind of presentation you are giving, you can connect and engage better with your audience through the use of storytelling. 

___________________________________________________________________

"What a cool twist on public speaking. I've taken a lot of boring public speaking courses, but this isn't one of them. The instructor keeps things moving, but he offers enough relevant information to make it worth my time. Creative and informative." --Joshua

"Surprising but delightful content! This class was a pleasant surprise and provided a new prospective..."--Steven

____________________________________________________________

This class is focused on the art and process of storytelling and will give you practical information to immediately improve your public speaking and storytelling abilities. 

YOU'LL LEARN TO CONNECT AND ENGAGE THROUGH:

    • The connection between storytelling and the brain
    • Defining a story and why we use them
    • The basic elements of a story
    • Advanced elements of a story
    • Tips for telling stories
    • Examples of great stories: 3 fairy tale examples
    • A review of the Class
    _______________________________________________________________________

"As a fellow fairy tale enthusiast, I so enjoyed Josh's class and the connections he made to classic fairy tales and public speaking. I have been studying and teaching fairy tales for decades and was pleased with this new approach." --Joan

________________________________________________________________________

ENROLL TODAY--RISK FREE--BECAUSE YOU ARE BACKED BY UDEMY'S 30-DAY 100% MONEY BACK GUARANTEE.
title: Proven Public Speaking Tips: Telling Stories Made Easy
